mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT( BOARD_IDX ) AS TOTALCOUNT FROM BOARD
WHERE SUBMENU_ID = #{ submenu_id }

SELECT B.BOARD_IDX, B.SUBMENU_ID, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONT, B.MARKET_VALUE, B.USERCODE, B.MANAGERCODE, TO_CHAR(B.BOARD_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') BOARD_REGDATE, B.READCOUNT, B.BNUM, B.LVL, B.STEP, B.NREF, B.DELBOARD, B.PARENT, M.USERID FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.USERCODE = M.USERCODE WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{ board_idx }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_IDX, SUBMENU_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONT, USERCODE, BNUM, NREF ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL( MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD), #{ submenu_id }, #{ board_title }, #{ board_cont }, (SELECT USERCODE FROM MEMBER WHERE USERID = #{ userid }), (SELECT NVL( MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD), (SELECT NVL( MAX(BOARD_IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD) )

INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_IDX, SUBMENU_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONT, USERCODE, BNUM, LVL, STEP, NREF, PARENT ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL( MAX(IDX), 0 ) + 1 FROM BOARD), #{ submenu_id }, #{ board_title }, #{ board_cont }, (SELECT USERCODE FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME = #{ userid }), #{ bnum }, #{ lvl } + 1, #{ step } + 1, #{ nref }, #{ parent } )
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NUM, BOARD_IDX, FILENAME, FILEEXT, SFILENAME FROM BOARD_FILES WHERE BOARD_IDX = #{ board_idx } ORDER BY FILE_NUM ASC
